reviewText:
#BeachBody -give us your whole catalog. This is a system I've successfully used myself. Follow the eating plan, don't skip snacks. Push play & modify moves when you want to.

This original P90 is *very* different from the new, extended version. One example is that in the new (white/gray box) version, "Sculpt A" *begins* with running in place, not a stretch. :/ Fine for those who choose, but...

This original version is AWESOME. Beach Body ought to add this (all) of their back-order stuff to their sales, just like musicians/albums.
